text.quote: 000: Clause 38, page 23, leave out line 38 and insert “where the Secretary of State is satisfied that a local authority has failed to comply with the code under section 4”
000: Clause 38, page 24, leave out lines 8 to 10
000: Clause 38, page 24, line 19, leave out “14 days” and insert “28 working days”
000: Clause 38, page 24, line 26, leave out from “must” to end of line 28 and insert “notify those authorities in writing”
000: Clause 38, page 24, leave out lines 33 to 35
000: Clause 38, page 24, line 41, leave out “14 day” and insert “28 working days”
000: Clause 38, page 24, line 44, at end insert—

“(12A) A direction under this section must take into account whether the authority has demonstrated to the external auditor that acting outside of the Code is in the financial interest of the authority to whom a possible direction may apply.”
000: Clause 39, page 26, line 14, leave out subsections (15) and (16)
000: Clause 39, page 26, line 25, at end insert—
“( ) This section ceases to have effect after 30 April 2016”
000: After Clause 39, insert the following new Clause—
(1) Any requirement for a local authority to publish a notice in a newspaper shall cease to have effect.

(2) Instead, the local authority shall publish the notice in question in such way as the local authority thinks is likely to bring it to the attention of the greatest number of people in the area most concerned.”
